tatami.pc.util.jade

Class PCJadeInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.pc.util.jade.PCJadeInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JadeInterface

    public class PCJadeInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements JadeInterface
    A class used in order to interact with Jade. One instance of this class corresponds to one JADE Platform.
    Author:
    Cedric Herpson, Tudor Benea, Andrei Olaru

      • startContainer

        public void startContainer(java.lang.String containerName)
        Method used by createContainer methods in order to start a container, having the name of the container specified and supporting null arguments. Not to be used for the main container.
        Specified by:
        startContainer in interface JadeInterface
        Parameters:
        containerName - - the name of the container

      • addAgentToContainer

        public void addAgentToContainer(java.lang.String containerName,
                       java.lang.String agentName,
                       java.lang.String agentClassName,
                       java.lang.Object[] agentArgs)
        Method which creates and starts an agent in a container specified by its name
        Specified by:
        addAgentToContainer in interface JadeInterface
        Parameters:
        containerName - - the name of the container; null for the main container - should be on the same machine
        agentName - - the name of the agent
        agentClassName - - the class of the agent, including the package
        agentArgs - - array of Objects, representing the arguments of the agent
